original: Krook, Erik Bertil Gunnar G :’S’on, tandläkare, Hovås, f. 11/9/02 i Kristianstad av stat:skriv. Gunnar K. o. Anna Thourén. G. 27 m. Giself Reichelt. Barn: Gunnar f. 28, Lennart 32, Christina 39. — Stud:ex. i Kristianstad 21, Cand. med. dent. i Berlin 23, tysk tandl. där 26, sv. d’to 27. Stud:res. t. Berlin 30, Paris o. Bryssel 37. Prakt, i Gbg sed. 27, skoltandl. i Marstrand 29-35, tandl. v. Gbgs stadsteater 35-45 o. v. Härianda centr:fäng. i Gbg sed. 37. Sekr. i Gbgs tandl :-fören. 36-38, rev. v. Gbgs vanföreanst. 30-45, sekr. i fören. Amerikagården 32-37, ordf. i Broittkärrs seglarkl. sed. 45, jed. av styr. f. Riks fören. f. svenskh. bev. i uti. sed. 36, led. av dess över-s’tyr. o. arb :ut^k. sed. 46. Hobby: segling. Dan’sk FrM 46.
translated:
Krook, Erik Bertil Gunnar G: 'S'on, dentist, Hovås, born on September 11, 1902, in Kristianstad, son of state clerk Gunnar K. and Anna Thourén. Married on 27 with Giself Reichelt. Children: Gunnar, born in 1928, Lennart, born in 1932, Christina, born in 1939.

Education: graduation exam in Kristianstad in 1921, dental degree in Berlin in 1923, German dentistry there in 1926, Swedish dentistry in 1927. Study trips to Berlin in 1930, Paris and Brussels in 1937. Practice in Gothenburg since 1927, school dentist in Marstrand from 1929 to 1935, dentist at Gothenburg City Theater from 1935 to 1945, and at Härianda Central Prison in Gothenburg since 1937. Secretary of the Gothenburg Dental Association from 1936 to 1938, auditor of the Gothenburg Disabled Association from 1930 to 1945, secretary of the Amerikagården Association from 1932 to 1937, chairman of the Broittkärr Sailing Club since 1945, board member of the National Association for the Preservation of Swedish Machinery Abroad since 1936, and member of its executive board and working committee since 1946. Hobby: sailing. Danish Freemason since 1946.
